Name: Unnatural Investigations
About the game: Demonic rifts have started to manifest across the world allowing creatures to enter our world and awaking those already here. An elite group was created in secret to locate, investigate, and eliminate those creatures. Choose from four special classes each equipped with special items and perks. Level up each class, switch classes in the field, master them all or focus on one. Engineer Class - Unlock doors, craft traps, drop ammo & more. Forensic Class - Examine corpse, locate clues & more. Occultist Class - Examine demonic items, locate rifts & more. Medium Class - Contact the dead, locate clues & more. Missions areas vary from small, medium to large. Small areas have no ambient danger making them safer. Medium areas have some ambient dangers like wolves and minor demons. Large maps not only have ambient dangers but also a unique world boss which you must kill after the mission boss is defeated. 4 player online coop 2 part gameplay - Investigation & Encounter Find clues to help identify the boss creature's weakness. Prepare for encounter Change ammo types to combat different creatures. Watch each other's backs
